issue.title: [Java] Add benchmark and large fake data UT for avro adapter
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6460](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6460). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
To avoid OOM, we have implement iterator API in ARROW-6220.

This issue is about to add tests with a large fake data set (say 6MM rows in JDBC adapter test) and ensures no OOMs occur.
